is a beefed up ERC20 implementation of DRIP20 that supports emission multipliers.Multipliers are useful when certain users should accrue larger emissions. For example,if an NFT drips 10 tokens per block to a user, and the user has 3 NFTs, then the usershould accrue 3 times as many tokens per block. This user would have a multiplier of 3.shout out to solmate (@t11s) for the slim and efficient ERC20 implementation!shout out to superfluid and UBI for the dripping inspiration!","version":1}},"settings":{"compilationTarget":{"contracts/GIGADRIP20.sol":"GIGADRIP20"},"evmVersion":"london","libraries":{},"metadata":{"bytecodeHash":"ipfs"},"optimizer":{"enabled":true,"runs":200},"remappings":[]},"sources":{"contracts/GIGADRIP20.sol":{"keccak256":"0x0e4846c67d5159c0c92e640c578a9642ce5449be28844273bf44f8cb5d558caf","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://fe112fddeb2a919e412737f4df876f0f184e271c754614f94a7c86e32e75eb5a","dweb:/ipfs/QmSeRovv4Qqvr4gndvzxS8dnHNqr1FBbSXCwAnCddKbZUS"]}},"version":1}
